author: barnabasbusa
content: metamask issue is related to a dshackle issue (we used a loadbalancer for the rpc endpoint)

author: barnabasbusa
content: our alternative public rpc endpoint for now is `https://rpc.teku-geth-001.srv.holesky.ethpandaops.io`

author: barnabasbusa
content: metamask should be working now, as we changed the default rpc endpoint also
